messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyUI-N-Nodes?
ComfyUI-N-Nodes is designed to enhance the functionality of ComfyUI by allowing users to create custom nodes for image and video generation.
How can I submit a feature request for ComfyUI-N-Nodes?
You can submit a feature request for ComfyUI-N-Nodes by opening an issue on the project's repository and following the feature request template provided.
